A Farewell to Arms is a compelling historical romance about an English nurse and an American ambulance driver who fall in love on the Italian front during World War I. The film features a talented cast and a poignant story that will stay with viewers long after the credits roll.

Another great choice would be War Horse, a thrilling and moving war film about a British soldier's extraordinary journey from the fields of Devon to the trenches of First World War France. The film features an unforgettable performance by David Thewlis.
